content:
Professional Steel Detailing Services

Professional steel detailing is essential for successful steel construction projects.

ASISA's expert steel services

ASISA provides comprehensive structural steel services including 3D modeling, shop drawing creation, and fabrication support. Our experienced steel detailers work with leading software to create accurate, detailed drawings. We specialize in complex steel structures, connection design, and coordination with other building systems.

Why Choose ASISA?

ASISA's offshore steel detailing services offer cost-effective solutions without compromising quality. Our services include model creation, connection detailing, material optimization, and quality assurance. We understand steel fabrication processes and can design connections that are both efficient and constructible.

Our Services

Our team ensures drawings meet AISC standards and project requirements. We provide ongoing support throughout fabrication and erection phases. With ASISA, you get reliable steel detailing services that help projects succeed. Contact ASISA to learn how our structural steel services can benefit your projects. Our steel detailers use Tekla Structures, Advance Steel, SDS/2, and other specialized software. We create detailed shop drawings, connection designs, and fabrication details that fabricators can use directly. ASISA's offshore steel detailing services offer significant cost savings while maintaining quality standards. We coordinate steel with architectural, structural, and MEP systems to ensure proper integration. Our team understands fabrication methods and can optimize designs for cost and efficiency.
